articles.author: Elliott Wenzler
articles.title: Bernie Sanders, AOC rally crowd of 30,000 in Denver’s Civic Center - The Denver Post
articles.description: “We will not allow America to become an oligarchy,” Vermont senator says.
articles.content: In what he described as his largest rally ever, U.S. Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vermont, spoke to a crowd that filled Denver’s Civic Center on Friday evening, railing against billionaires and President D… [+4509 chars]
